      • getAuthenticationResult

        public abstract AuthenticationResult getAuthenticationResult​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                                      throws AuthenticationException,
                                                             AccountLockedException,
                                                             MustChangePasswordException
        Parse the incoming request and return an AuthenticationResult.
        Parameters:
        request -
        response -
        Returns:
        null if no http auth credentials, or the actual authentication result based on the credentials.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException
        MustChangePasswordException
        AccountLockedException
